overview: Never that easy when you want some gear - then again it's not always that easy when you want some cock! Well there's plenty of both in Fucking Gangstas as the lads get sorted in more ways than one! With fit lads galore and plenty of spunk, this fuckfest brings scallies with attitude to a whole new level. Indeed spanking, socks, feet and trainers are all featured in this perv's delight as muscle bound straight gangsta Andrew beats his bros into submission.
title: Fucking Gangstas
